 Has sworn off saying f*** but said it at some point: Denshi, Yukumo,...
body:
Regularly says f***: Tsunoi, Adachi, Chiba, Kaetsu

Has sworn off saying f*** but said it at some point: Denshi, Yukumo, Rikimaru, Nagai, Ueno

Has not said f*** before but can if so desired: Sarumatsu, Sumizawa, Fukuyo, Shibata

Has not said f** before and refuses to say it: Hachimura, Kazama, Kirigaya, Ishikura, Akimoto

Legally not allowed to say f***: Midoriya, Miryoku

summary: bnha 217!! this week’s chapter was amazing. all the things i missed about bnha during the previous arc all in one. a fitting...
body:
bnha 217!! this week’s chapter was amazing. all the things i missed about bnha during the previous arc all in one. a fitting bridge to the next arc.

buckle up, because this post is gonna be long!

  • BAKUGOU AND MIDORIYA IMMEDIATELY FIGHTING TO SEE HOW THE BLACKWHIP QUIRK WORKS DKSFLHDSLKFHDBSLKHLDKSKFJ
    • please,,,, kids you’re gonna give all might a heart attack kdfhls
  • bakugou having tea and chatting with all might and midoriya in the secret little room!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i’m love
    • he’s very perceptive though, and i’m glad that he mentioned how similar midoriya is to AFO now– I wonder how this’ll play out in the future…
  • THIS GUY IS THE SIXTH USER, CONFIRMED BY ALL MIGHT. I wanna know more about him hhhhh ; - ;
  • other fun shenanigans!! the little interactions between class A and B were so cute, i loved it.  
  • i’m happy Todoroki had that little talk with Midoriya, even though he seems too trusting of Midoriya. he even texted Endeavor to learn more fire techniques…. 
    • endeavor’s reaction to getting a text had me like dsfhklds but todoroki arc upcoming maybe?
    • this panel/observation by bakugou actually killed me i think i died laughhing:
  • EVEN MORE THINGS… MIC POINTING OUT THAT SHINSOU REMINDS AIZAWA OF HIMSELF? or like “Shirakumo”
    • almost 100% the guy in Aizawa’s flashback. The name is similar to Yamikumo, which was Midoriya’s prototype’s name. I wonder what he’ll be like, and when we’ll be getting this Aizawa backstory…
  • ERI CALLING MONOMA THE DARK SIDE OF UA KDSHLFLSDKKHFKSJDLFLK ADORABLE
    • ALSO MONOMA HAVING A HORN LIKE ERI…  CUTE
  • I do like the insight on his quirk, though, and how he’s figured out a part of OFA: it’s a stockpiling quirk. That aside… how does Eri’s quirk work and how will it be part of the plot moving forward?
  • ^the fatgum example + this midoriya face also made me dsfklsdjhkfl
  • Midoriya reassuring Eri and the two of them resolving to love/master their respective quirks was a very sweet and fitting end.

All in all: i loved this chapter so much, we got back to normal amounts of information, future arc teasing, and fun stuff.

I don’t know for sure what’s gonna happen next, honestly. Midoriya quirk development? Eri quirk developments? Aizawa backstory? Todoroki training arc? There’s too much going on for me to tell, but I don’t mind guessing. 

(Actually, in a WSJ magazine teaser, it was revealed that the next arc is gonna have some villains in it, but I’m gonna pretend I didn’t see it ;;)

Next week there’s gonna be a break, so I’ll see you all the week after that~

blog.name: aroaesflags
blog.title: Requests: Closed
blog.description: Just an aroace enby who likes editing flags. TERFs, exclusionists, truscum, MAPs, etc. don't interact. Edits are free to use with credit (and please tag me if you make something with them! I want to see!). Don't repost my edits. This blog is discourse-free and anyone trying to start discourse will be blocked.

blog.name: katsudekufanficrec
blog.title: katsudeku fanfic rec
blog.description: All my KatsuDeku fanfic recommendations in one place! Feel free to ask for a list or leave your own recommendation! Click here to check all tags!

summary: Hi! Do you know some fic about Midoriya having a quirk? Thx u !
question: Hi! Do you know some fic about Midoriya having a quirk? Thx u !
answer:
Izuku has a Quirk (and it isn’t One for All)

By Design by EtherealBeing

As time went by, Izuku found it more and more difficult to reconcile his perceived quirklessness with the ever-growing permanence of his imaginary friend, Kacchan. This boy he’d created, whose very existence was designed to balance out his own shortcomings — he couldn’t always see him. Hear him. Feel him.

Kacchan, this boy whom Izuku made as an extension of himself — he wasn’t always real.

[Explicit - 4/? Chapters]

Switch by Dante_Morgan

What if, at age four, Izuku didn’t manifest his mother’s Telekinesis, or even his father’s Fire Breathing, but a Hardening Quirk instead?

It drastically changes the nature of his relationship with Katsuki, for one. It also exacerbates his reckless streak, but fortunately his Quirk does a fairly decent job at keeping him safe from harm.

It does not however, prevent him from getting dragged into (and occasionally causing) one completely absurd situation after another.

[Teen and Up Audiences - 12/? Chapters]

Waiting is worth it by wikikid

Izuku has an amazing quirk, and it was very strong, some may describe it as overpowered. Unfortunately, it has come with a price. The manifestation of his quirk has left him with a scar that will stay for a very long time.
–
Alternatively: Izuku has telekinesis and got paralysed when his quirk manifested.

[Teen and Up Audiences - 16/? Chapters - Disability, Rehabilitation]

Yūrei no Eiyū by FandomManiac22

“If you wanna be a hero that badly, there’s a quick way to do it. Believe that you’ll be born with a quirk in your next life and take a swan dive off the roof!”

When Katsuki’s comment comes at just the wrong time, Izuku takes his advice. But it is not the end.

Alternatively:
In another world where Izuku is attacked by the sludge villain on the way to school instead of after it, his dreams get crushed too soon. With nothing to save him and Katsuki’s words ringing in his ears, Izuku decides to end it all by jumping off his school’s roof. As his body cracks on the ground, Izuku does not pass on to the next world. Instead, he is left as a ghost among many others. When the slime villain escapes from jail and attacks the person Izuku can’t help but care for, he learns that there may be more to his afterlife than he thought.

And maybe he can be a hero after all.

[Teen and Up Audiences - 16/? Chapters - Izuku Jumped, Ghost]

Stygian Fire by LadyGreenFrisbee

Izuku’s Quirk manifest at the tender age of five. It’s strange that he would have a fire Quirk given what his mother’s Quirk is, but he chalks it up to genetics on his father’s side.

A week later, there’s a (familiar) stranger in the kitchen, and everything changes.

[Mature - 7/? Chapters - Note: Izuku is Endeavor’s son and I am in love with this one in particular]

Secret Touch by OneDayShipping

Quirk Discovery AU. Quirks manifest up until the age of four. After no quirk seemed to manifest within him, Midoriya went about his frantic studies of heroes, meeting All Might, receiving One For All and attending UA. However, this seemingly quirkless teen is about to discover that he had a quirk after all.

(Born from a silly thought I had once upon a time.)

[Mature - 15/? Chapters]

Don’t Look by GrimReader

No one spots the cracks. No one notices how carefully pieced together he is. Under his bright smile and determined gaze no one sees, no one hears, NO ONE feels how broken he is.

At least, that’s what he thought.

Izuku is not human. He is a fraud. Not deserving of any love. Nothing but a vile monster.

At least, that’s what he believed.

He’s made of scales not glass. He’s always in control. He is invincible.

That is, until he became Midoriya Izuku.

[Mature - 16/? Chapters - Crossover/Based on… Akatsuki no Yona]

I hope you all enjou it!

A week later, there’s a (familiar) stranger in the kitchen, and everything changes.

[Mature - 7/? Chapters - Note: Izuku is Endeavor’s son and I am in love with this one in particular]

Secret Touch by OneDayShipping

Quirk Discovery AU. Quirks manifest up until the age of four. After no quirk seemed to manifest within him, Midoriya went about his frantic studies of heroes, meeting All Might, receiving One For All and attending UA. However, this seemingly quirkless teen is about to discover that he had a quirk after all.

(Born from a silly thought I had once upon a time.)

[Mature - 15/? Chapters]

Don’t Look by GrimReader

No one spots the cracks. No one notices how carefully pieced together he is. Under his bright smile and determined gaze no one sees, no one hears, NO ONE feels how broken he is.

At least, that’s what he thought.

Izuku is not human. He is a fraud. Not deserving of any love. Nothing but a vile monster.

At least, that’s what he believed.

He’s made of scales not glass. He’s always in control. He is invincible.

That is, until he became Midoriya Izuku.

[Mature - 16/? Chapters - Crossover/Based on… Akatsuki no Yona]

I hope you all enjou it!

trail.content_raw:
Izuku has a Quirk (and it isn’t One for All)

By Design by EtherealBeing

As time went by, Izuku found it more and more difficult to reconcile his perceived quirklessness with the ever-growing permanence of his imaginary friend, Kacchan. This boy he’d created, whose very existence was designed to balance out his own shortcomings — he couldn’t always see him. Hear him. Feel him.

Kacchan, this boy whom Izuku made as an extension of himself — he wasn’t always real.

[Explicit - 4/? Chapters]

Switch by Dante_Morgan

What if, at age four, Izuku didn’t manifest his mother’s Telekinesis, or even his father’s Fire Breathing, but a Hardening Quirk instead?

It drastically changes the nature of his relationship with Katsuki, for one. It also exacerbates his reckless streak, but fortunately his Quirk does a fairly decent job at keeping him safe from harm.

It does not however, prevent him from getting dragged into (and occasionally causing) one completely absurd situation after another.

[Teen and Up Audiences - 12/? Chapters]

Waiting is worth it by wikikid

Izuku has an amazing quirk, and it was very strong, some may describe it as overpowered. Unfortunately, it has come with a price. The manifestation of his quirk has left him with a scar that will stay for a very long time.
–
Alternatively: Izuku has telekinesis and got paralysed when his quirk manifested.

[Teen and Up Audiences - 16/? Chapters - Disability, Rehabilitation]

Yūrei no Eiyū by FandomManiac22

“If you wanna be a hero that badly, there’s a quick way to do it. Believe that you’ll be born with a quirk in your next life and take a swan dive off the roof!”

When Katsuki’s comment comes at just the wrong time, Izuku takes his advice. But it is not the end.

Alternatively:
In another world where Izuku is attacked by the sludge villain on the way to school instead of after it, his dreams get crushed too soon. With nothing to save him and Katsuki’s words ringing in his ears, Izuku decides to end it all by jumping off his school’s roof. As his body cracks on the ground, Izuku does not pass on to the next world. Instead, he is left as a ghost among many others. When the slime villain escapes from jail and attacks the person Izuku can’t help but care for, he learns that there may be more to his afterlife than he thought.

And maybe he can be a hero after all.

[Teen and Up Audiences - 16/? Chapters - Izuku Jumped, Ghost]

Stygian Fire by LadyGreenFrisbee

Izuku’s Quirk manifest at the tender age of five. It’s strange that he would have a fire Quirk given what his mother’s Quirk is, but he chalks it up to genetics on his father’s side.

A week later, there’s a (familiar) stranger in the kitchen, and everything changes.

[Mature - 7/? Chapters - Note: Izuku is Endeavor’s son and I am in love with this one in particular]

Secret Touch by OneDayShipping

Quirk Discovery AU. Quirks manifest up until the age of four. After no quirk seemed to manifest within him, Midoriya went about his frantic studies of heroes, meeting All Might, receiving One For All and attending UA. However, this seemingly quirkless teen is about to discover that he had a quirk after all.

(Born from a silly thought I had once upon a time.)

[Mature - 15/? Chapters]

Don’t Look by GrimReader

No one spots the cracks. No one notices how carefully pieced together he is. Under his bright smile and determined gaze no one sees, no one hears, NO ONE feels how broken he is.

At least, that’s what he thought.

Izuku is not human. He is a fraud. Not deserving of any love. Nothing but a vile monster.

At least, that’s what he believed.

He’s made of scales not glass. He’s always in control. He is invincible.

That is, until he became Midoriya Izuku.

[Mature - 16/? Chapters - Crossover/Based on… Akatsuki no Yona]

I hope you all enjou it!
trail.content:

body:
Can I copy your homework?

I’ll help you with it: Midoriya, Hachimura, Shibata, Sumizawa, Miryoku

Yeah, sure: Ueno, Rikimaru, Nagai

Bold of you to assume I did the homework: Fukuyo, Ishikura, Kazama, Yukumo

Wait, we had homework?: Kaetsu, Tsunoi, Akimoto

lol nope: Sarumatsu, Adachi, Denshi, Kirigaya

Read 5:55: Chiba

tags: who is the dude called shiragumo
title: Next BNHA Arc?
body:
Me: Bro hear me out. This dude we saw in chapter 216 and is assumedly called "Shiragumo" in the last chapter? When Aizawa had a brief flashback? And we're going into a villain arc. What if this dude turned into a villain but used to be friends with mic and aizawa and we get like angst and character background for mic and aizawa.
Friend: IT'S DABI! 
Friend: jk. that would be kinda cool
Me: P sure dabi is too young? meh who knows
Friend: Also p sure he's too young
